ResourceHeader.Description: Solar Science Observatory is a solar research group at the National Astronomical Observatory of Japan (NAOJ) in Miatka city, Tokyo, Japan. Main ground-based instruments are the Solar Flare Telescope, which have a full-disk continuum, G-band, Calcium-K, H-alpha imagers and an infrared magnetograph, and the New Sunspot Telescope (10 cm refractor for the sunspot observation). These are located in NAOJ Mitaka campus.
